snippet: Relatives of Meredith Kercher, the 21-year-old murdered in 2007, said Tuesday that the family was still awaiting the “full truth,” which they believe could emerge in the next phase of the case.
lead_paragraph: Relatives of Meredith Kercher, the 21-year-old murdered in 2007, said Tuesday that the family was still awaiting the “full truth,” which they believe could emerge in the next phase of the case.

headline.main: Slain Student’s Family Hopes Facts Will Emerge
headline.print_headline: Slain Student’s Family Hopes Facts Will Emerge
headline.seo: Slain Student’s Family Hopes Facts Will Emerge
